# Weight [Nest]

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false

source(here::here("src", "init.R"), echo = FALSE)
```

❖ **Data**

```{r}
#| echo: false

responses <- c("Avg_Weight")
predictors <- c("Condition")

data <- load_Weight_Nest()

Avg_Weight_name <- "Average weight of Pups per Nest at P0 *(g)*"

data
```

❖ **Description**

```{r}
#| echo: false

describe_variables(data)
```

❖ **Correlations**

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

corr_matrix_plot(data, vars = c(predictors, responses))
```


## Average Pup weight at P0 (based on nest weight)

```{r}
#| echo: false

## WARN: Always put the chosen model in first position
models <- list(
  glmmTMB(
    Avg_Weight ~ Condition,
    disp = ~ Condition,
    data = data,
    family = gaussian("identity"),
    REML = FALSE
  )
)
```
